page.title: 14Shalfleet Church
page.content: The{newest}thing in the church is the{New Order of Prayer.}There is a new{hymn book}with more modern hymns. It has 200 new hymns plus the best of the old ones. A small{crucifix}was rescued from a bonfire some years ago. It was found in a brick wall when someone in the village was doing up their house. It is made of a kind of gum. It used to hang on the wall over the{pulpit}but they have put it away now for safety. A little{red lamp}burns in the chancel.It means there is always somebody somewhere{praying. } There are two{war memorials.}One is a window.There is a tiny submarine and a tiny aeroplane hidden in the design. There are door curtains with fine embroidery on them.
